Sentencas: In solid oxide cell (SOC) electrodes, nickel oxide reduction is a fundamental step occurring during the initial stages of cell operation.
Titulo: Tracking nickel oxide reduction in solid oxide cells via ex-situ ptychographic nano-tomography

Sentencas: The reduction procedure is considered to be crucial in producing the final fuel electrode microstructure.
Titulo: Tracking nickel oxide reduction in solid oxide cells via ex-situ ptychographic nano-tomography

Sentencas: This work studies the reduction reaction occurring in a SOC fuel electrode by means of X-ray ptychographic nanotomography.
Titulo: Tracking nickel oxide reduction in solid oxide cells via ex-situ ptychographic nano-tomography

Sentencas: The same microstructure is analyzed in its pristine state and after 1 h of reduction at 850 degrees C, in dry hydrogen.
Titulo: Tracking nickel oxide reduction in solid oxide cells via ex-situ ptychographic nano-tomography

Sentencas: The microstructure evolution is discussed in terms of changes in volume fractions, surface areas, and connectivity of the different constituent materials.
Titulo: Tracking nickel oxide reduction in solid oxide cells via ex-situ ptychographic nano-tomography

Sentencas: The pore network in the unreduced cermet is revealed to be fully isolated, implying that reduction proceeds inwards from the edges of the sample towards the center.
Titulo: Tracking nickel oxide reduction in solid oxide cells via ex-situ ptychographic nano-tomography

Sentencas: For the given experimental conditions we report that reduction is complete after 1 h of treatment but the resulting nickel network is not yet percolated and detached from the yttria-stabilized zirconia.
Titulo: Tracking nickel oxide reduction in solid oxide cells via ex-situ ptychographic nano-tomography
